WorkItem.Description:
The gear list in the right pane frequently shows the same item with multiple gemmings.
Â 
Only the best gemming should be shown by default. (perhaps the score could show the possible range of gemmings?)
Mask of the Watcher: 108.25 (84.25 - 108.25)
WorkItem.Summary: Rawr shows same item multiple times with different gemmings

Comments.Message: Please search for existing issues before posting.

This isn't an issue, this is a feature.  The best gemming changes rapidly as your other gear changes.  It's commonly valuable to swap to a less effective gemming to change out where hit/expertise is and then go change another piece of gear and attempt to get a better overal score.

The current gemming system is unintuitive, hard to use, and cluttered. We know. We're revamping the gemming system for the next version of Rawr. No further reports of how much it sucks are required.
The current gemming system is unintuitive, hard to use, and cluttered. We know. We're revamping the gemming system for the next version of Rawr. No further reports of how much it sucks are required.

Thank you for your comment, Astrylian. 
Pasting your boilerplate THREE times really emphasized your point. I'm not sure I would have followed you the first two times. 

Perhaps you would be better served by closing this as a duplicate of another bug. 
The mysterious gemming bug describing this issue that I was unable to find.
